Feats-General — Male Human Fighter: 10
Strength: 16 (3) Dexterity: 19 (4) Constitution: 13 (1) Intelligence: 17 (3) Wisdom: 13 (1) Charisma: 19 (4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Good Deity: Greek-Apollo (CG)
Ability Boosts: Charisma: 3; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 3; Strength: 2; Wisdom: 2 Experience: 68174/85000 Level: 10 Size: Medium Speed: 40 Carry/Lift: 240/480

Athlete: Standing, running long jump, and running high jump each use only 5' of movement/Can climb at full speed

Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 4

Feature Notes:
Additional Fighting Style: Can select a second Fighting Style
Fighting Style: 2 selections
Martial Archetype: 1 selection
Keen Mind: Always knows the direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset/Can recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Greek-Apollo and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: Acrobatics; Deception; Insight; Intimidation; Performance; Religion; Survival
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 8 Insight: (wis) 5 Performance: (cha) 8
Animal Handling: (wis) 1 Intimidation: (cha) 8 Persuasion: (cha) 4
Arcana: (int) 3 Investigation: (int) 3 Religion: (int) 7
Athletics: (str) 3 Medicine: (wis) 1 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 4
Deception: (cha) 8 Nature: (int) 3 Stealth: (dex) 4
History: (int) 3 Perception: (wis) 1 Survival: (wis) 5
Languages: Common; Draconic; Dwarvish; Elvish; Gnomish; Infernal; Orc
Skill Notes:
Linguist: Language (Choose 3 from any)
Skilled: Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from any)
Actor: Has advantage on Deception and Performance to impersonate another person and can mimic others' speech or sounds
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth
Dungeon Delver: Has advantage on Perception and Investigation (secret door detection)/Suffers no Perception penalty when traveling at a fast pace
Healer: Using a healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 hit point/Can use a healer's kit to restore 1d6+4 + target HD hit points once per creature per short rest
Linguist: Can create ciphers (DC 21 Intelligence to decode)
Medium Armor Master: Suffers no Stealth disadvantage from wearing medium armor
Observant: Can read lips/+5 passive Investigation and passive Perception
Remarkable Athlete: +3' running jump distance
Skulker: Can hide when lightly obscured/Ranged miss does not reveal position/Suffers no disadvantage on Perception from dim light
Combat
Hit Points: 71 Initiative: 9 Armor Class: 18 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Battleaxe; Blowgun; Club; Dagger; Improvised; Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: None Weapons: Club (+7 1d4+3 B); Flail (+7 1d8+3 B); Light Crossbow (+8 1d8+4 P R80/320); Light Hammer (+7 1d4+3 B R20/60); Unarmed (+7 1d4+3 B)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +4
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Heavily Armored: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
Lightly Armored: Armor Proficiency (Light)
Martial Adept: Has the Combat Superiority feature with 2 maneuvers and 1 die
Medium Armor Master: +1 Armor Class in medium armor if Dexterity is at least 16
Moderately Armored: Armor Proficiency (Medium/Shield)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Tavern Brawler: Weapon Proficiency (Improvised)/Unarmed attacks inflict 1d4 HP
Tough: +20 Hit Points
Weapon Master: Weapon Proficiency (Choose 4 from any Simple Weapon, any Martial Weapon)
Action Surge: Can take an extra action once per short rest
Alert: Cannot be surprised, and unseen foes gain no advantage on attacks on self
Charger: Can use a bonus action after a 10' Dash to attack (+5 damage) or to push 10'
Combat Superiority: Can use a d6 Superiority Die to perform one of 2 chosen Maneuvers 1 time per short rest
Crossbow Expert: Ignores the loading quality of proficient crossbows/Suffers no disadvantage on ranged attacks within 5'/Can use a bonus action to make a hand crossbow attack after a one-handed attack
Defensive Duelist: Can use a reaction to gain +4 Armor Class when wielding a proficient finesse weapon
Distracting Strike: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and give advantage to the next ally attack against the same foe before the start of the next turn
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Durable: Regains a minimum of 2 hit points from a Hit Die roll
Fighting Style (Protection): Can use a reaction and a shield to inflict disadvantage on attacks targeting an adjacent creature
Grappler: Has advantage on attacks on a grappled foe and can restrain a grappled foe with an additional successful grapple
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Heavy Armor Master: Suffers -3 HP damage from nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapons when wearing heavy armor
Improved Critical: Scores a critical hit on a natural 19
Inspiring Leader: R30' 10-min speech gives 6 allies 14 temporary hit points once per target per short rest
Lucky: Can gain advantage on an attack, ability check, or save or inflict foe disadvantage an attack on self 3 times per long rest
Lunging Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and gain +5' melee range
Mage Slayer: Can use a reaction to attack an adjacent caster/Foe suffers disadvantage on concentration to maintain a spell in response to a self attack
Mobile: Can Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Attacking a target does not provoke an opportunity attack
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Second Wind: Can use a bonus action to regain 1d10+10 hit points once per short rest
Sentinel: Successful opportunity attacks halt the target/Can take an opportunity attack when a foe uses Disengage/Can use a reaction to attack when an adjacent foe attacks another
Sharpshooter: Suffers no disadvantage on attacks at long range/Ranged attacks ignore 3/4 cover/Can make a -5 attack with a ranged weapon to inflict +10 damage
Shield Master: Can use a bonus action to shove the target 5' after an attack
Tavern Brawler: Can use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 4; Constitution: 5; Dexterity: 4; Intelligence: 3; Strength: 7; Wisdom: 1
Save Notes:
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Dungeon Delver: Has advantage to avoid or resist traps and resistance to trap damage
Indomitable: Can reroll a failed save once per long rest
Mage Slayer: Has advantage on saves vs. spells cast by adjacent foes
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Shield Master: +0 Dexterity vs. targeted spells and effects, and can use a reaction to suffer no damage instead of half on a successful Dexterity save
Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 2; B1: 1; C0: 2; C1: 1; D0: 2; D1: 1; K0: 2; K1: 1; S0: 2; S1: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: B: 8; C: 5; D: 5; K: 8; S: 8; W: 7 Spell DC: B: 16; C: 13; D: 13; K: 16; S: 16; W: 15
Spells:
Blade Ward (B0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Fire Bolt (S0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Hellish Rebuke (K1 Evoc): R60' Cast as a reaction, inflicts 2d10 HP fire on a successful attacker (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Heroism (B1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +4 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Jump (S1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Hand (B0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Mage Hand (K0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target can hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Minor Illusion (K0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; can be used for a ranged spell attack that inflicts 2d8 HP and ends the spell
Purify Food And Drink (C1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Ray Of Frost (W0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 2d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 bard cantrips and can cast a chosen B1 spell once per long rest
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips and can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips and can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 warlock cantrips and can cast a chosen K1 spell once per long rest
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Notes
